In his keynote speech Monday at the trade show, Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer rebutted that suggestion. "Nokia's support will help Windows Phone overall to build strength versus other mobile platforms," Steve Ballmer said. That's not just good for Nokia, that's good for all our handset partners. Steve Ballmer also demonstrated some of the improvements that are coming to Windows Phone 7 this year. They include a faster Web browser and quicker switching between applications. Shares of Nokia fell 52 cents,

Joe Donnelly in northern Indiana, said she was excited by the prospect of Mike Pence running for governor. I think he's the clear frontrunner and I think the race is his if he chooses to accept it, Jackie Walorski said. "I think he'd clear the field." Vint Cerf said Eric Schmidt , 55, had been chief executive for 10 years- "a nice round number"- and Page, now 37, was ready to lead the company into the future. Larry and Sergey Brin are 10 years older than they were when they thoughtfully hired Eric Schmidt to be the CEO... so everybody's growing up, Vint Cerf said. "He was the only guy that stood up to them- these were two young, smart, incredibly brilliant guys who literally had just dropped their PhDs to go start this company.

Donald Rumsfeld takes particular aim at human rights advocates' reporting on Andijan. Self-proclaimed human rights advocates with longstanding records of opposition to the Uzbekistan government... seemed interested in embarrassing George Washington , he wrote. was palpable. Here it was, the come-from-behind drive that longtime franchise quarterback Donovan McNabb had failed to produce so many times. Michael Vick had his chance. "We were very confident," Michael Vick said. We thought we were going to win the game. I thought we were going to win the game. I had an upbeat feeling about myself. I felt like I was in control. . The acerbic Brit, known for a mix of music savvy, wit and a tinge of nastiness, made Idol a phenomenon when the American version of England's Pop Idol launched in 2002. Without Simon Cowell , I'm not sure how successful Idol would have been, regardless of how good( Season 1 winner) Kelly Clarkson was, says Atlanta Journal-Constitution blogger Rodney Ho.
